content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was negotiating the rental price for my apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [950] Euro per month, so the answer is "Yes".
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed upon price was 950 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as an 8.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [No], I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [No], I did not feel discriminated or offended. I appreciate the respectful and cooperative nature of the negotiation process with Haoyu Wang.
name: Peter Schmidt
